channel.title: Tidyverse on Lee Durbin
channel.description: Recent content in Tidyverse on Lee Durbin

item.title: Tweeting About New History Books Using R
item.description: Where it all started At the end of 2016 I published a blog post elsewhere about the perceived lack of gender diversity in History Today Magazine. It was mostly well received and the magazine published a response where they revealed that “an estimated 80 per cent of unsolicited pitches and submissions received by History Today are from men”. I re-subscribed to History Today recently, and things do seem to have improved in the four years since I last looked into this (I’m not taking credit for that, I’m just pleased to see it).
